name: Retro Racer (NerdIt Studios)
description:
Want to play a fast paced, Sci-Fi hover bike racer? Then this game is for you!!
Due to this game being made for a game jam, and the limitation is "no text" (Except for the title), how to play and the controls are listed below.

HOW TO PLAY:
Pick an unlocked level in the Level Menu. As soon as the level has started up the race countdown will start. When the holographic wall turns white, all hover bikes will start up at once and will begin racing.

Note: To qualify for the next level you must come in the top 3.

CONTROLS:
Standard WASD controls.

Space bar to boost. There is a 10 second cooldown between each boost.

To leave a race/race, press the ESC button.

Note: you can only turn when either W or S is held down.
